text: lol far from yelling "save the trees" daily 🌲🤷‍♀️

passion for activism means odd hours and heaps of engagements. tricky balancing act with my SO - communication & understanding are key! we gotta respect each other's hustle even when it gets tough but yeah it ain't easy at all times 🌍✊
really tricky when your work = your passion
kinda always sorting trash now - work habits die hard 🌿
